official_title: A bill to establish a Federal Task Force on the Homeless.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Federal Task Force on the Homeless Act - Establishes in the executive branch a Federal Task Force on Food and Shelter for the Homeless. Requires quarterly reports to the Congress. Terminates the Federal Task Force on Food and Shelter for the Homeless in the Department of Health and Human Services upon enactment of this Act, and transfers all personnel, property, and funds to the executive Task Force. Establishes within such Task Force an Interagency Advisory Council on Homelessness. Sets forth operating and administrative provisions. Authorizes FY 1987 through 1991 appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to establish a Federal Task Force on the Homeless.
